Articles.Content: So, I recently bought a Logitech Attack 3 to enhance my KSP experience and I wanted to utilize it for both docking and attitude adjustment and all sorts of turning. But what I realize is that the joystick can only register 2 motions! Forward and back, and side to side. The problem is, how do I map these 2 functions to 3 types of turning (pitch, roll and yaw)?
Does the joystick twist? If not then there is no way to turn 2 axes into 3. I would recommend returning it if possible and look at something like the Logitech extreme 3d pro for about $20-30
